title: Behind the Beautiful Forevers
author: Katherine Boo
description: Author Katherine Boo describes her observations when she visited Mumbai, India. The book follows the lives of residents of Annawadi, a slum near Mumbai airport, and gives outsiders a look into poverty, inequality, and resiliance in modern India.

title: Animal Farm
author: George Orwell
description: A critique of the Russian Revolution and Stalinist era; this book follows a group of farm animals that rebel against their human farmer with the hope to create a new society of equality and properity.

title: Atomic Habits: An Easy & Proven Way to Build Good Habits & Break Bad Ones
author: James Clear
description: A self-help book which aims to provide a framework for building good habits and breaking bad ones. It emphasizes the power of small changes 'atomic habits' that compound overtime to create bigger and more profound change within oneself.

title: Dune
author: Frank Herbert
description: On the planet of Arrakis, young heir Paul Atreides must learn to navigate the political landscape in order to keep his family in power through ruling the spice melange trade.

title: The Diary of a Young Girl
author: Anne Frank
description: This is the diary of Anne Frank, a young Jewish girl, who detailed in her diary her experience in hiding for two years with her family during Nazi occupation of the Netherlands.
